## hpr1707 :: A tour round my desktop

 
Unetbootin: https://unetbootin.sourceforge.net/

LibreOffice: https://www.libreoffice.org/

AbiWord: https://abisource.org/

Gnumeric: https://www.gnumeric.org/

PDF-Shuffler: https://sourceforge.net/projects/pdfshuffler/

Audacity: https://audacity.sourceforge.net/

Audio Tag Tool: https://freecode.com/projects/audiotagtool

Bombono DVD: https://www.bombono.org/cgi-bin/wiki/

Decibel Audio Player: https://decibel.silent-blade.org/

Handbrake: https://handbrake.fr/

MHWaveEdit: https://gna.org/projects/mhwaveedit/

Minitube: https://flavio.tordini.org/minitube

OpenShot: https://openshot.org/

Sound Converter: https://soundconverter.org/

VLC: https://www.videolan.org/vlc/

Filezilla: https://filezilla-project.org/

Dia: https://wiki.gnome.org/Apps/Dia

GIMP: https://www.gimp.org/

GScan2PDF: https://freecode.com/projects/gscan2pdf

Inkscape: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inkscape

Krita: https://krita.org/

Simple Scan: https://github.com/mnagel/simple-scan

XSane: https://www.sane-project.org/

Stellarium: https://stellarium.org/

SQLiteman: https://sqliteman.yarpen.cz/

Gambas: https://gambas.sourceforge.net/en/main.html

Lazarus: https://lazarus.freepascal.org/

Get-iplayer: https://github.com/get-iplayer/get_iplayer

SearchMonkey: https://freecode.com/projects/searchmonkey
